title: Brave & Bold Premium Watchface
summary: Brave & Bold - Premium is the COOLEST Watchface around for your Android Wear!
description: Brave & Bold – Premium Watchface is the Coolest in the town! Designed to perfectly blend into your Watchface collection and adds that cool & trendy touch to your Android Wear experience.*Highly Visible Face Featuring 8 Cool themes to choose from.*6 Stylish Seconds Hand Colours to choose from.*Funky & very Cool Eye Ball Motion Effect .*Minimal & Elegant Weather Updates.*Designed for Round & Square watches*Cool Ambient mode design. *Stands out with its Slick, Funky & Cool looks.*Whether you are Young or not so young :p *At your work desk or an evening café hang out with friends.*Getting an early morning coffee or sneaking out for lunch.*Feeling either sporty or weirdly geeky.Brave & Bold – Premium Watchface is a must have in your Collection.Supported DevicesBrave & Bold - Premium Watchface has been tested live on Moto360 and LG G Watch.It also supports LG G WATCH R, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear LIVE.Feedback & Support We try very hard not to disappoint our customers and we depend upon your support & valuable feedback to keep coming up with Quality products for the SmartWatch eco-system.Please don’t rate us 1-Star. If you see any bugs / errors that let you down, please email us your issues @ support.android@devwizards.co and we’ll try our best to resolve those in a timely manner.Installation & Other common synchronization problemsIf Brave & Bold - Premium Watchface does not appear on your Android Wear App or the Watch itself, don’t worry and try out the below instructions: a)	Wait for few minutes and it should come up in Android Wear app or the watch.b)	If it doesn’t show up, disconnect your watch from your phone and reconnect.c)	If it still doesn’t work, hold down your watchface in your watch and see if it’s showing up there.d)	Restart your watch.e)	Uninstall Brave & Bold - Premium Watchface and reinstall it again.f)	Lastly reset your watch and then try all of the above again.
descriptionHTML:
Brave & Bold – Premium Watchface is the Coolest in the town! Designed to perfectly blend into your Watchface collection and adds that cool & trendy touch to your Android Wear experience.


*Highly Visible Face Featuring 8 Cool themes to choose from.

*6 Stylish Seconds Hand Colours to choose from.

*Funky & very Cool Eye Ball Motion Effect .

*Minimal & Elegant Weather Updates.

*Designed for Round & Square watches

*Cool Ambient mode design.

*Stands out with its Slick, Funky & Cool looks.

*Whether you are Young or not so young :p

*At your work desk or an evening café hang out with friends.

*Getting an early morning coffee or sneaking out for lunch.

*Feeling either sporty or weirdly geeky.

Brave & Bold – Premium Watchface is a must have in your Collection.

Supported Devices

Brave & Bold - Premium Watchface has been tested live on Moto360 and LG G Watch.

It also supports LG G WATCH R, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear LIVE.

Feedback & Support

We try very hard not to disappoint our customers and we depend upon your support & valuable feedback to keep coming up with Quality products for the SmartWatch eco-system.

Please don’t rate us 1-Star. If you see any bugs / errors that let you down, please email us your issues @ support.android@devwizards.co and we’ll try our best to resolve those in a timely manner.

Installation & Other common synchronization problems

If Brave & Bold - Premium Watchface does not appear on your Android Wear App or the Watch itself, don’t worry and try out the below instructions:

a) Wait for few minutes and it should come up in Android Wear app or the watch.
b) If it doesn’t show up, disconnect your watch from your phone and reconnect.
c) If it still doesn’t work, hold down your watchface in your watch and see if it’s showing up there.
d) Restart your watch.
e) Uninstall Brave & Bold - Premium Watchface and reinstall it again.
f) Lastly reset your watch and then try all of the above again.
comments: It does not work on the smart watch 3 Please fix. It won't let me change colors
Very Cool app! Thumbs up Great! Super eye ball effect + loads pf custom colours choice and awesome seconds hand :)
